subdivision_of_building: 1st floor flat and adjoining attic space above
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s) GF-2509-dr Existing Ground Floor Plan (Rev. V2); EFF-2509-DR Existing 1/F Plan (Rev. V3); Existing Attic Plan (received on 05.07.2023); ERP-2509-DR Existing Roof Plan (Rev. V2); EFE-2509-DR Existing Front Elevation (Rev. V3); ELSE-2509-DR Existing Left Side Elevation (Rev. V2); ERSE-2509-DR Existing Right Side Elevation (Rev. V2); ERE-2509-DR Existing Rear Elevation (Rev. V3); Proposed 1/F Plan (received on 05.07.2023); Proposed Attic Plan (received on 05.07.2023); Proposed Roof Plan (received on 05.07.2023); Proposed Front Elevation (received on 05.07.2023); Proposed Left Side Elevation (received on 05.07.2023); Proposed Right Side Elevation (received on 05.07.2023); Proposed Rear Elevation (received on 05.07.2023)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby approved development shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the  area in accordance with policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Installation of two roof lights to front roofslope and two roof lights to rear roofslope; removal of 2nd floor chimney breast
